name: getSettingTemplate
description:
This API lets you retrieve a specific account phone template previously created.
**Scope**:
* `phone:write:admin` or `phone:write` **Prerequisites**:
1. Business or Enterprise Account 2. A Zoom Phone license
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`

custom_query_fields.description: Provide the name of the field to use to filter the response. For example, if you provide "description" as the value of the field, you will get a response similar to the following: {“description”: “template description”}.

$ul: **name**: Specify the name of the template.
**enable**: Allow current extension to record and save calls in the cloud.
**recording_start_prompt**: Play a prompt to call participants when the recording has started.
**recording_start_prompt**: Play a prompt to call participants when the recording has started.
**enable**: Allow user to send and receive messages.
**enable**: Allow current extension to access, receive, or share voicemail.
**area_code**: The area code from which the phone account was created.
**country**: Name of the country where the template was created.
**type**: The type of template being queried. Values: `user`, `group`, `auto receptionist` `common area`,`zr`, `interop`.

**audio_prompt_language**: Audio prompt language code.
American English: `en-US`
**business_hour_action**: When a call is not answered:
**connect_to_operator**: Allow callers to press Zero to reach an operator or press One to leave a message, or allow neither of these options.
**id**: Phone extension ID of the user, zoomRoom, commonAreaPhone, autoReceptionist, callQueue or sharedLineGroup.
**ringing_duration**: Ringing Duration for Each Device in seconds. Values:
**close_hour_action**: Action to take when a call is not answered:
**connect_to_operator**: Allow callers to press Zero to reach an operator or press One to leave a message, or allow neither of these options.
**id**: Phone extension ID of the user, zoomRoom, commonAreaPhone, autoReceptionist, callQueue or sharedLineGroup.
**max_wait_time**: Max Wait Time in seconds. Values:
**hold_music**: The value of this field can be either `default` or `disable`.
